channel.title: jira.namics.com
channel.description: An XML representation of a search request

item.title: [DISTRELEC-5448] DE // Info field for VAT Number
item.description:
Mac OS X 10.9.5
Safari 7.1

https://test.distrelec.de/login/checkout/register/b2b?csrt=11622194238062427558

Please add info field for MWST-ID field in registration form for B2B, it's not possible to register with an 9 or 11 digit VAT number.
item.summary: DE // Info field for VAT Number

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.

comments.comment:
Please test after the next deployment
Thanks!

item.title: [DISTRELEC-5447] LT // registration during checkout as guest not possible
item.description:
Mac OS X 10.9.5
Safari 7.1

https://test.distrelec.lt/login/checkout/register/guest?csrt=17705520615853527789

Start logged out, add 25 x 600323 to the cart, continue checkout as guest is not possible.
item.summary: LT // registration during checkout as guest not possible

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-5446] Recalculating after adding a product direct is not working (Ajax Call)
item.description:
Case:
1) add product to the cart -> increase quantity -> recalulating works
2) add product directyl in the cart -> increasy quantity -> recalculating dont work! (see prt screen attached)

Important:
The total amount is correct! Also when you are refreshing page, the amount is correct.
item.summary: Recalculating after adding a product direct is not working (Ajax Call)

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.

comments.comment:
Please test after the next deployment
Thanks

item.title: [DISTRELEC-5445] LT // Subtotal during checkout not correct
item.description:
Mac OS X 10.9.5
Safari 7.1

not logged in

https://test.distrelec.lt/cart

Add article 600325 10 times to cart, click on continue check out, price is wrong in the subtotal.
item.summary: LT // Subtotal during checkout not correct

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-5433] Guest order - Not possible
item.description:
Issue
Guest-orders are not working at the moment. If the form is filled and the "continue"-button is hit nothing happens. Please check what's the issue, thanks.

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-5455] LT // Modify valdiation rule of customer number
item.description: Please align the validation rule of the customer number field in the customer registration in LT with DE.
item.summary: LT // Modify valdiation rule of customer number

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-5438] IT // Calaculation of shopping card doesn't works
item.description: Calaculation of shopping list doesn't works in the Movex case.
item.summary: IT // Calaculation of shopping card doesn't works

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-5434] LT // E-mail content not correct
item.description:
Mac OS X 10.9.5
Safari 7.1
TS-39.35

distrelec.testing+lt8@gmail.com, pw distrelec

https://mail.google.com/mail/u/0/?tab=wm#inbox/1491922aff153dbc

Add some products to the cart, share card via e-mail, in the received e-mail the images are missing.

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment:
Hi Patrick,
This is working fine in the production website. www.distrelec.lt
It looks that Gmail does not trust very much the emails coming from Test, that's why the images are not displayed even if you click in the "show images" link.
Please re-test in Prod after the deployment.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-5400] B2B & B2C naming
item.description:
please replace everywhere in the shop:

B2B with Geschäftskunde
B2C with Privatkunde

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment: The only point is in the page settings

Please test after the next deployment
thanks

item.title: [DISTRELEC-5377] AUFTRAGSBESTÄTIGUNGEN bleiben im Shop offen
item.description:
Diese Anfrage haben wir regelmässig.

 

Von: Stefan Schätti stefan.schaetti@schaetti-ag.ch
Gesendet: Montag, 13. Oktober 2014 18:01
An: FM CH DIS Info
Betreff: AW: AUFTRAGSBESTÄTIGUNG vom 26.09.14/EOB 356 1195

 

Hallo

 

Wieso sind alte Bestellungen geliefert und bezahlt online noch im Status offen?

 

 

Besten Dank für Ihre Bemühungen

 

Freundliche Grüsse

Stefan Schätti

 

Schätti AG Metallwarenfabrik

Tschachen 2

CH-8762 Schwanden

 

Fon +41 55 647 34 11

Fax +41 55 647 34 21

[1]stefan.schaetti@schaetti-ag.ch

[2]www.schaetti-ag.ch

 

----Ursprüngliche Nachricht----
Von: Distrelec [[3]mailto:info@distrelec.com]
Gesendet: Freitag, 26. September 2014 12:09
An: [4]info@schaetti-ag.ch
Betreff: AUFTRAGSBESTÄTIGUNG vom 26.09.14/EOB 356 1195

 

 

Sehr geehrter Kunde,

Gemäss Ihrer Bestellung/Anfrage erhalten Sie im Anhang die gewünschten Unterlagen.

 

Cher client,

Selon votre commande/demande, nous vous envoyons dans l'annexe les documents souhaités.

 

Mit freundlichen Grüssen / Meilleures salutations Distrelec

 

==========================================

Distrelec

Zweigniederlassung der Dätwyler Schweiz AG Grabenstrasse 6

CH-8606 Nänikon

Tel. +41 44 944 99 11

Fax  +41 44 944 99 88

Mailto: [5]info@distrelec.com

[6]http://www.distrelec.com

==========================================
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment:
Hallo Raphi,
Die Order Status scheinen noch immer nicht upgedated obwohl Robi Spittaler und ein Full Export geliefert hat letzte Woche.
Dies siehst Du vor allem bei Order 001JOE9I vom 03.09.2014
Should be fixed with the new optimized import logic. I have imported the file again on the live system and now it is fixed and the status is correct

item.title: [DISTRELEC-5117] Remove repeated intro sentence
item.description:
Remove the sentence "

{customer}

möchte den Warenkorb mit Ihnen teilen." that repeats the title at the cart-sharing email template.

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment:
Hi Florian

There is no slot in the CMS where we can edit this. The template has to be adapted in general...

Please have someone of your team do it. Otherwise you need to show it to us or better Angel, since he has now Braden in his team who still has access to hybris too.

Many thanks,
Sarah & Marc

Hi Sarah,

Which email template you are using here ?

item.title: [DISTRELEC-4940] LT // Checkout step 3 delivery-date scrambled
item.description:
Issue
The space for the backorder-date is too small, therefore generates ugly breaks.

Notes
This emerged due to the changes at the review page in CH/AT/IT - now the column is too small. As those countries(movex) do not have backorder-dates.

Goal
The full backorder-date and the title should be placed on one line.

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment: This task is on hold until we're able to develop again on the live-shops.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-4598] Quick win: Renaming of Tabs in Search Suggest
item.description:
Rename the tabs in the search suggest layer to:

"Produktvorschläge" for Products (1)
"Kategorievorschläge" for Categories (2)
"Markenvorschläge" for Manufacturers (3)

EN:
1 Product suggestions
2 Category suggestions
3 Manufacturere suggestions

LT:
1 Pasirinkti prekes
2 Pasirinkti kategorijas
3 Pasirinkti gamintojus

IT: no translation/change needed
item.summary: Quick win: Renaming of Tabs in Search Suggest

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment:
Rafael,
can you please add this to the property translations?
IT (and FR presumably) stay the same.
